title: Create Notification Detail Component
description: Develop UI component for displaying detailed notification information

user_stories: As a user, I want to view detailed notification information so that I can understand the message
As a user, I want to take action on notifications so that I can respond appropriately
business_rules: Notification detail view must show complete notification information
Notification detail view must follow the design system
Notification detail view must handle loading states and error messages
Notification detail view must provide action buttons when applicable
edge_cases: Handling loading states for notification details
Managing error conditions when notification data is not available
Displaying notification information with proper formatting
Handling notifications with missing or incomplete information

acceptance_criteria: Notification detail component shows complete notification information
Notification detail component follows the design system
Notification detail component handles loading states and error conditions properly
Notification detail component integrates with Notification Management API endpoints
Notification detail component provides action buttons when applicable

integration_tests: Notification detail integration with backend APIs
Action button integration with related entities

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement notification detail component following Angular best practices. Ensure proper integration with notification management API. Display related information and provide action buttons when applicable.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper authorization checks for notification detail access. Protect sensitive notification information. Validate data before display.
